abstract: Apps for the new devices and updated operating system include games, Microsoft’s Office suite, the Flipboard news aggregator and “content blockers.”
snippet: Apps for the new devices and updated operating system include games, Microsoft’s Office suite, the Flipboard news aggregator and “content blockers.”
lead_paragraph: Apple’s newest iPhones are hitting store shelves this week. Many millions of older iPhones and iPads are also getting an upgrade, as the latest version of Apple’s mobile operating system, iOS 9, is now available.

headline.main: Find Out What Apple’s New iPhones and iOS Can Do
headline.print_headline: Some Tools to Use on Those New iPhones
